--- Testing vfmaddsub231ps (Fused Multiply-Alternating Add/Subtract of Packed Single-Precision Floating-Point Values) ---
Input a: 1.500000 2.500000 3.500000 4.500000 5.500000 6.500000 7.500000 8.500000 
Input b: 0.500000 1.500000 2.500000 3.500000 4.500000 5.500000 6.500000 7.500000 
Input c: 1.000000 2.000000 3.000000 4.000000 5.000000 6.000000 7.000000 8.000000 
Result: -0.250000 5.750000 5.750000 19.750000 19.750000 41.750000 41.750000 71.750000 
Expected: -0.250000 5.750000 5.750000 19.750000 19.750000 41.750000 41.750000 71.750000
